枱字的基本解释

枱
sì
古同“耜”，耒端；锹、臿一类的起土农具，后指犁上的铧。

枱
tái
“檯”的简体字（曾在新加坡通行）。

枱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sì］
［《集韻》象齒切，上止，邪。］
亦作“耛1”。
(1)即耜。
(2)木名。
[②]［tái］
同“檯1”。
桌类。

枱字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　枱； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页517第05
【廣韻】弋之切【集韻】盈之切，?音移。【說文】耒端木也。【博雅】柄也。【類篇】柌、??同枱。　又【集韻】詳兹切，音詞。又【五音集韻】象齒切，音似。義?同。　【正字通】或作鈶。木柄，金首。从木从金，義通。

枱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
枱字的起名意思

暂无。

station
Basic explanation of words
station
sì
In ancient times, "Liu", Lei Duan; earth-lifting agricultural tools such as shovel and shovel, refer to the shackle on the plow.
station
tái
The simplified characters of "Taiwan" (previously used in Singapore).
station
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sì］
["Jiyun" like teeth cut, top stop, evil. ]
Also known as "耛1".
(1) That is to say.
(2) Wooden name.
[②]［tái］
Same as "Taiwan 1".
Table class.
station
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　台; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 517 05
[Guang Yun] Yi Zhi Cut [Ji Yun] Ying Zhi cut, sound shifted. [Said Wen] Lei Duanmu also. [Bo Ya] handle also. 【Classes】Teacher and ?? are on the same stage.　[Jiyun] Detailed words and sounds. Also [Pentagram Rhyme] like teeth cut, sound like. Righteous? Same.　【Zhengzitong】or as a 鈶. Wooden handle, golden head. From wood to gold, righteousness.

tái, sì
сущ.
